data.text: @mirandaDMD Hi, for pets that are acceptable for carriage as baggage, please refer to this link: https://t.co/ZvmgSNi769. Thank you.

@johannjcPTMS Hi, Johann. We're truly sorry to hear this. We have sent you a DM. Thank you.
@mm_singzon You're welcome!
@Shahad97323118 Hi, Shahad. We have sent you a DM. Thank you.
@saudi_educated We are sorry for the inconvenience. We sent you a DM. Please check your inbox.
@sara_alshmrani1 Hi, Sara. We have sent you a DM. Thank you.

@mm_singzon Hi, Mm. Please know that no liquids exceeding 100ml (container) will be allowed inside the cabin. If you will need water inside the cabin, you may request this from our cabin crew. Thank you.
@IM_DocMark We've sent you a dm, Dr. Mark.

data.text:
@MuteipAlSaif @AlkeerSultan You may check our website, https://t.co/ePCV247Zu7, for flight status updates.

Please click on the ‘Flight Status’ tab on the homepage, and provide either your flight number or your travel details on the corresponding date field. Thank you!

@jrhel28 Here is a quick troubleshooting guide we advise you to try.
(1) Clear your browsing history, cache, and cookies
(2) Use a different browser or device

Let us know if this works. Thank you.

@jrhel28 We’re sorry if you experience some issues with our website, Jrhel. May we suggest to refresh, clear your browser's cache, use an incognito tab or try using a different device or browser? Thank you.
@YaraMZ_ We sent you a direct message, Y. Thank you.
@jrhel28 Hi, jrhel. We apologize for the inconvenience. May we know if you also raised this concern with your issuing bank?
@donluche Hi, Don. How may we assist you?
@jezerap__ We sent you a direct message, Jezer. Thank you.
@MuteipAlSaif @AlkeerSultan Hi, @MuteipAlSaif. May we know the original flight number and flight date?
@YaraMZ_ This is noted, Y. We sent you a direct message.
@YaraMZ_ This is noted. We will request additional booking information from you. Kindly adjust your settings on Twitter so we can send you a direct message. Thank you.

@NnKyrl Hello, Leo. We have sent you a DM. Thank you.
@brewartificer Thank you as well, Daryl!
@brewartificer This is noted, Daryl. This will be forwarded to the relevant offices for their information and necessary action. Thank you.

@junkat24 We are currently experiencing challenges at the airport due to lack of manpower of our ground handlers. We are very sorry for the inconvenience. Rest assured, your feedback will be raised to the attention of the offices concerned. Thank you.

@prityjenn Please allow us to explain that 
US-bound passengers are required to undergo additional security screening in Manila. This is a requirement by the US Department of Homeland Security to ensure the safety and protection of Philippine Airlines passengers in the flight.

urls.title: Fill | myPAL Request Hub
urls.description: Booking requests at your fingertips. The myPAL Request Hub provides passengers with convenient servicing options. Through this secure online form, you can request the following transactions wherever you are: • Rebook due to schedule change, travel restrictions, or cancellations • Convert your Ticket to a Travel Credit • Request for refund • Follow-up on an existing request You can use this online facility in 3 easy steps: 1. Fill out the form 2. Click SUBMIT 3. Receive a confirmation via email Important Reminders: • For more information on your booking change options, visit https://bit.ly/PALPassengerOptions page. • For tickets issued by our partner travel agents, requests on booking changes must be made through your issuing travel agent. • myPAL Request Hub can assist requests for changes to confirmed bookings on Philippine Airlines flights which were made through the PAL Website, PAL Mobile App, PAL Ticket Offices, or PAL’s Reservations Hotline.

data.text:
@itscarolaineang Hi, Carol. You can reach our Reservations hotline at: 

Manila Landline – (+632) 8855-8888 
Philippines Mobile (+63) 919-056-2255
7:00AM to 11:00PM (PH Time)

USA/Canada – 1-800-435-9725 

You may also send your request at: https://t.co/SbQiwFUjiS.

data.text: @rampadoro Hi rampadoro. We have no advisory regarding this yet. Kindly check our website https://t.co/ePCV23PQfZ, or follow our social media accounts, so that you'll be updated the moment we release advisories on new developments.

@CryptOak20 You're welcome!
@neitaro We're truly sorry to  hear this, Nei. We'll send you a dm so we can look into your concern.

(2/2)

@CryptOak20 Noted, Oak. If both flights are operated by PAL and are immediately connecting, you will only need to comply with the travel requirements of your final destination. 

(1/n)
